meanings.definition: The bone of the thigh, the femur.
meanings.sent1: She felt pain in her thighbones after running a marathon.
meanings.sent2: The doctor pointed to the thighbones on the X-ray.
meanings.sent3: Carrying heavy bags all day made her thighbones ache.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as strong as thighbones.
meanings.sent5: The thighbones supported her weight as she stood up.

meanings.sent1: The museum displayed ancient thighbones of various animals.
meanings.sent2: The archaeologists found thighbones of dinosaurs in the excavation site.
meanings.sent3: The thighbones in the collection were surprisingly well-preserved.
meanings.sent4: The thighbones in the exhibit seemed to tell a story of the past.
meanings.sent5: The thighbones were the largest bones in the display.
